snippet: Stan Wawrinka will try to follow up his U.S. Open championship with another title in St. Petersburg after beating Roberto Bautista Agut 7-6 (8), 6-2 in their semifinal Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Stan Wawrinka will try to follow up his U.S. Open championship with another title in St. Petersburg after beating Roberto Bautista Agut 7-6 (8), 6-2 in their semifinal Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka to Face 'Future of Tennis' Zverev in Russia Final
headline.main: Wawrinka to Face 'Future of Tennis' Zverev in Russia Final
